# example file for input preparation of DIRpred pipeline
# file is tab separated list of inputs, with the following columns
# 1 - type: can be LIGAND, MSTA, MSA
# 2 - path: the PATH to the file
# 3 - name: the NAME of LIGAND
# 4 - pdb: the PDB ID of LIGAND
#
LIGAND	../alignments/ensembl_AREG_orthologues_prot.fa	AREG	2rnl
LIGAND	../alignments/ensembl_BTC_orthologues_prot.fa	BTC	1ip0
LIGAND	../alignments/ensembl_EPGN_orthologues_prot.fa	EPGN	5wb8
LIGAND	../alignments/ensembl_EREG_orthologues_prot.fa	EREG	5wb7
LIGAND	../alignments/ensembl_HBEGF_orthologues_prot.fa	HBEGF	1mox
LIGAND	../alignments/ensembl_orthologues_egf_protein.fa	EGF	1ivo
LIGAND	../alignments/ensembl_TGFA_orthologues_prot.fa	TGFA	1xdt
MSTA	../alignments/MStA_ligands_scary.fasta
MSA	../alignments/ligands_msa.fa
RECEPTOR	EGFR	../alignments/ensembl_orthologues_egfr_protein.fa
